name: Tappy Halloween
description:
The craziest, most addictive, stupidly ridiculous Halloween game of 2015!

Dress up real life gamer cat, Wilber Kitty Cat, in over 32 ridiculous costumes then tap or glide to go trick or treating. Pick up as much candy and as many doors as you can to earn points and costumes, but stay away from those creeptastic weirdos out for a Halloween hootenanny.

- Two modes: Tap to jump and hold to glide for double the fun

- Collect doors for a chance to unlock over 32 (yes that means 33) costumes

- Silly, crazy, stupid, ridiculous and weirdly addictive
